title: Energy majors lock onto Southeast Asia in race for more gas for AI power demand
summary: KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) -Energy majors are pouring money into gas exploration and production in Malaysia and Indonesia to meet rising power demand from growing populations and a proliferation of data centres in the region. Read full story

title: AI to reduce Amazon’s corporate workforce: CEO Andy Jassy in internal memo
summary: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has told staff that AI will gradually reduce the company’s corporate workforce. In an internal memo, he highlighted efficiency gains from AI integration across operations.

title: Comelec division cancels registration of Duterte Youth
summary: The Comelec 2nd Division says the grounds for cancellation are related to lacking requirements for the poll body's rules for accrediting party-list groups
